column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The ambiance is nice
column2: has a rustic and chill vibe. I've seen a pretty diverse crowd here from young professionals to a business crowd to elderly couples doing a date night out. Know what really stands out to me though? The staff. Every single person I've encountered is friendly
column5: and honest. I've watched the assistant managers
column7: and owners serve food and pack up food alongside their wait staff. I highly appreciate being able to watch a team work so well together and work alongside one another like that. It's a rare find and it translates in the service given.
